```{r}
library(petro.One)

major   <- c("PUNQ-S3")
minor   <- c("machine-learning", "machine learning")

search_result <- run_papers_search(major, minor, get_papers = FALSE, 
                                   verbose = TRUE, len_keywords = 4)
```


```{r rows.print=25}
papers <- search_result$papers
papers
```

```{r}
# eliminate duplicates
papers <- papers %>% 
    distinct(paper_id, .keep_all = TRUE) %>% 
    distinct(book_title, .keep_all = TRUE) %>%  
    print
```

```{r rows.print=25}
papers %>% 
    group_by(year) %>%
    summarize(n  = n()) %>% 
    print
```


```{r}
papers %>%
    filter(year == 2003)
```
